rows.label: qev050504_MSG0001
rows.name: I SAID that's enough![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0002
rows.name:
Please, all I ask is that you hear what I have to say.
It is a matter of life and death for my entire people![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0003
rows.name: It seems more like a matter of MY death![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0004
rows.name: You return! Have you found me a sword, perchance?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0005
rows.name:
Ah! This shall be my trusty blade, my partner with
whom I shall share fate and cleave all in twain![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0006
rows.name: ...Which brings me back to you, madam![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0007
rows.name: NOOOOOOOOO![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0008
rows.name:
Yes, this sword will indeed suffice...for a kitchen knife!
Now, please hear out my request if it is convenient.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0009
rows.name:
This "q'eik" you serve in your establishment...
Will you please teach me the secret of its creation?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0010
rows.name: NOOOOOOOOO—um, wait. What?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0011
rows.name:
"Q'eik," madam. That most delectable of foodstuffs
with the flowery aroma and the spongy, sweet taste?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0012
rows.name:
It was a celebration to behold, and an even further
celebration in my mouth. A true delight for every sense![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0013
rows.name:
I would dearly like to craft this lump of pure culinary
joy for myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0014
rows.name:
Now that I have acquired a knife—the core tool of any
chef—I am ready to learn![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0015
rows.name: Okay, shut the front door.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0016
rows.name:
I'm going to go ahead and assume by "q'eik" you
mean cake, so put away the knife. No knives in cake.
Also, a sword isn't a knife. I'm just saying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0017
rows.name:
Well, not technically, no. But many a fine meal was
made on the battlefield using weapons for cooking
implements, my most dearest and wisest of madams![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0018
rows.name:
Riiiight. Okay. Think I've heard enough to get the
picture. But first things first, put that sword...
Er, knife... Whatever. The pointy thing. Put it away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0019
rows.name: As you wish.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0020
rows.name:
Holy crap, finally. Now what were we talking about?
Oh, right. Cake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0021
rows.name: Why the sudden interest in baking?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0022
rows.name:
To a Wrothian, meals are a way to refuel for battle.
A means of taking in calories and nothing more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0023
rows.name:
During times of war, all that matters is how quickly a
meal can be prepared and consumed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0024
rows.name:
It is nothing more than adding oil to a machine.
Finding pleasure in dining is a foreign concept.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0025
rows.name: And yet...this "q'eik." This glorious "q'eik"...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0026
rows.name:
The moment that what should be simple alimentation
entered my mouth, I found my soul stirred and my
morale at an all-time high.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0027
rows.name:
We are accustomed to drawing physical strength from
the food we consume, but this replenishes mind and
spirit as well![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0028
rows.name:
I was flabbergasted! This is a miracle ration, madam!
This is..."q'eik"![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0029
rows.name: Wow. Just...wow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0030
rows.name:
I have never in my life heard anyone wax poetic over
one of my cakes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0031
rows.name:
I guess you don't seem like a bad type of guy.
Little passionate maybe...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0032
rows.name:
If this "q'eik" can bolster my people's spirits, raise their
morale, and give them the will to live, then I must know
its secrets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0033
rows.name:
I will forever turn my sword into a kitchen knife and
wield it not to cut down foes, but to lift up allies![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0034
rows.name: Yeaaah, I'm still not buying that a sword is a knife.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0035
rows.name:
My blade was never able to split asunder more than a
hundred foes in a single battle, yet if I can master
"q'eik," I could save three times that many allies![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0036
rows.name: Please! Teach me to make your "q'eik"![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0037
rows.name:
Um, yeah. Look, if it's combat rations you want,
I'm not sure cake is the best fit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0038
rows.name: What? But why?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0039
rows.name:
Well, it spoils pretty fast, so you can't really bake it in
bulk and store it. Also, it's a hassle to make even when
you AREN'T trying to put it together on a battlefield.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0040
rows.name: But...my mouth celebration...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0041
rows.name: Sorry to burst your bubble, buddy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0042
rows.name:
Is there nothing else?! Something able to lift the spirits
that can be crafted in the field?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0043
rows.name:
Well I suppose, but... Listen, I DO want to point
out that I run a bakery and not a field outfitter.
We're all aware of this, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0044
rows.name:
Anyway, the sort of thing you want is outside my field
of expertise. I'd need a proper recipe to teach you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0045
rows.name:
But if you had such a recipe, that would be sufficient?
You would train me in the creation of new foodstuffs?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0046
rows.name: Very well. I shall find a recipe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0047
rows.name:
It so happens we are in the presence of a master of
such searches! One who is freshly done finding my
sword for me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0048
rows.name:
I assume you heard everything? Then I beg you on a
thousand bended knees and for the sake of my people,
help me find this...recipe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0049
rows.name:
...Pssst! Heh! Yeah, so this guy seems a bit...picky.
Probably best to bring a few different recipes
just in case.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0050
rows.name:
I am ever in your debt, good [ST:gender p1=sir p2=madam ].
Know that you have my eternal gratitude![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0051
rows.name:
I beg your pardon for my uncouth insistence,
but have you any word on that sword yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0052
rows.name:
I do apologize for my impatience. You are very kind to
assist me. Just please make haste if at all possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050504_MSG0053
rows.name:
My conversation with the lady here grows more
awkward by the minute...[ST:wait ]
